Description: Website title displayed in the browser title bar.
Default setting for attribute grouping of KPIs, charts and tables.
Visual KPI site administrator contact (will also be used for cache server error notifications).
Default link action when clicking site logos.

Controls screen data update interval (in seconds) for web pages. A setting of 0 will turn off page data refresh. (Note: This should not be faster than your cache cycle as the cache time determines how often data is refreshed on the server).
Controls the default color theme (light or dark) for the site. Users can override this setting on each client if allowed.

Attribute: Allow Users to Change Color Theme
Description: Determines whether or not end users will be able to select between Dark and Light themes.
Controls the default display time (client time or server time) for all rendered timestamps. Users can override this setting on each client if allowed.

Attribute: Allow Users to Change Client Display Time
Description: Determines whether or not end users will be able to select between client and server times for all rendered timestamps.

Controls the interval (in minutes) for a full page refresh. This helps clear memory leaks which are unfortunately common and not entirely unavoidable (yet) in web applications. (Note: User actions will reset the interval. A value of 0 turns off this refresh).
Controls whether clicking on an external link opens in a new Tab/Window or the same Tab/Window as the website.
Controls whether clicking on an internal link opens in a new Tab/Window or the same Tab/Window as the website.
